entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is trying to transport Dumbledore to Hogsmeade.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A professor and a wizard, who has been struck by lightning and needs to be transported to Hogsmeade.

entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: A village in the Harry Potter universe, where Harry is trying to transport Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Harry is carrying Dumbledore on his back as he tries to transport him to Hogsmeade.
Harry's destination is Hogsmeade, where he is trying to transport Dumbledore.
